5 class UnknownSettingsException(Exception):
6  pass

9 class Settings:
10  def __init__(self, dao):
11  self.__dao = dao
12 
13  def exists(self, name):
14  query = 'SELECT id FROM settings WHERE name = :name'
15  result = self.__dao.execute(query, {'name': name}).fetchone()
16  if result is None:
17  return False, None
18  else:
19  return True, result['id']
20 
21  def get(self, name):
22  query = 'SELECT value, type FROM settings WHERE name = :name'
23  result = self.__dao.execute(query, {'name': name}).fetchone()
24  if result is None:
25  raise UnknownSettingsException()
26 
27  if result['type'] is None or isinstance(result['type'], str):
28  value_type = result['type']
29  else:
30  value_type = result['type'].decode()
31 
32  if result['value'] is None or isinstance(result['value'], str):
33  value = result['value']
34  else:
35  value = result['value'].decode()
36 
37  return value, value_type
38 
39  def set(self, name, value, value_type):
40  try:
41  if value_type == 'bool' and value not in [
42  'True', 'true', 'False', 'false'
43  ]:
44  raise ValueError()
45  else:
46  locate(value_type)(value)
47  except ValueError:
48  raise TypeError('{} is not of type {}'.format(value, value_type))
49 
50  settings_exists, settings_id = self.exists(name)
51 
52  params = {
53  'value': value,
54  'type': value_type,
55  'name': name,
56  }
57 
58  if settings_exists:
59  query = 'UPDATE settings SET value = :value, type = :type WHERE name = :name'
60  else:
61  query = 'INSERT INTO settings VALUES (:id, :name, :value, :type)'
62  params['id'] = str(uuid.uuid4())
63 
64  self.__dao.execute(query, params)
